title: Best of The Herd: 05/08/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 05/08/2019
description:
Colin says that the 76ers cannot build around Joel Embiid and they should ship him out of town soon while he still has value.  He goes through his QB pyramid and explains why Dak Prescott is in tier 3 which means you can't pay him tier 1 money.  Plus, FS1's Nick Wright comes on to rub it in Colin's face how right he was about the Bucks and Kyrie Irving.  Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
